participant_1.background:
I spent time with my kids and family on my last birthday.
i have a dog and two cats.
i graduated valedictorian of my high school class.
i smoke a pipe.
My hunting dog is the most valuable thing I own because he is my best friend and a loyal companion.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.
my favorite band is one direction.
when i retire i want to open a bakery.
I went to a music festival and expressed myself through dancing and singing.
I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.

content.text: Hey there! What are some things you enjoy doing for fun?
I enjoy going to music festivals and comic con! I like expressing myself through dancing and singing.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to comic con too. Do you have any favorite bands?
My favorite band is One Direction! They're so talented and I love their music.
I've heard good things about them! I'll have to check them out. What are some of your other hobbies?
I like to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games. I also enjoy baking, and I want to open a bakery when I retire.
Baking is a lot of fun! I love making pies and cakes. Do you have any favorite recipes?
I love making chocolate chip cookies! They're so easy to make and they always turn out delicious.
I love chocolate chip cookies too! They're my favorite kind of cookie.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm glad I met you.
Me too! I'm glad we could chat.
